lead_paragraph: KANTOR--Adrienne Christina, of New York, New York, passed away on June 16, 2016 after a long illness. She was the beloved wife of Robert Kantor, and loving mother of Mary Kantor. She was the dear sister of Leslie Matthews and Gregory Dick. She is survived by many nieces and nephews whom she loved. Adrienne was a woman who touched the lives and hearts of many. Those who knew Adrienne regarded her as a "generous soul". She also had a passion for animals, both big and small. She gave selflessly, and was sincerely devoted to her family as well as to her many horses. Adrienne had worked for many years in the Fashion Industry, developing her own successful company, Adrienne Victoria Designs Inc. Together with her husband, they launched several successful contemporary brands including Page III, Ginger & Java, and MaryL Dresses as well as a large private label business. Adrienne subsequently served as the Chief Merchandising Officer at publicly traded Cache Stores Inc. after selling her company to them in 2008. The family will be receiving friends at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel located at 1076 Madison Ave., New York, NY 10028 on Sunday, June 19th from 2-4pm and 7-9pm, with Chapel Service on Monday, June 20th at 10am. In lieu of flowers, the family would appreciate donations in Adrienne's memory to The MSA Coalition, address as below. The MSA Coalition, 9935-D Rea Rd., #
